 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מֶעָל‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==going in== (Syriac, <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup>; <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**Onk**</sup></lookup>, etc., <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַעֲלָנָא‎</span>); — plural construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מֶעָלֵי שִׁמְשָׁא‎</span> [[Dan.6.15|Dan 6:15]] i.e. ***sunset*** (so read [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>GGA, 1884, 1020 Str M</sup> [[BDB#Bev|Bev]], compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; &gt; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מֵעָלֵי‎</span>, [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַעֲלֵי‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§, Beisp.</sup> ***b***)).
